messages.message:
This doesn't seem to be working: extract_all_pdf_layers true (it removes all the PDF layers but keeps the image).
https://www.instabase.com/apps/ocr/review-doc/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/rbs/workspace-matt/samples/Royal%20Bank%20-%20Change%20Address/out/s1_process_files/Adrian%20Torres_.pdf.ibocr?i=0&ibflowresults=#

Here is the flow: https://www.instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/rbs/workspace-matt/flows/change%20of%20address.ibflow#
yes. I just looked at the raw PDF — this is due to the fact they are using PDF Acro forms — we have limited support for this but can add in a few fixes for this
with ACRO forms, i’m not sure if we can place the form values by location accurately
does “force_image_ocr” handle ACRO forms correctly? If so I would recommend using that
We are getting some weird Abby errors with the boxes and removing the boxes causes just as many weird errors

I see — this would require a code change since we currently dont have a refiner function to extract things from an ACRO form — we could add it though — let us know the urgency of it and we can prioritize
It would be a nice to have as RBS infra wouldn’t be able to update in time.
not exactly sure what that means actually — you’re saying we should make the code push — and if so by what date?
Sorry meant to say it’s a nice to have at this point, RBS infra can’t update in time so it would be for future use but won’t be useful right now based on deployment times.
